EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Inquiry (1328116087.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Celeste,
Thank you for the inquiry you placed in our system. You mentioned in your inquiry that the company you would like an opportunity with works with MBO Partners, what specific company was this that you are referring to? I am trying to make sure I refer you to the correct individual to speak with so if you could give me additional information on what you are looking for that would help.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
